Created an attachment (id=40215)
Verifies the input is non-null before fetching a selection
Can this be approved in time to be included in the next Platform/UI build submission (3:30 today)?
Since version 1.10 of the file CommonNavigatorManager, it seems this bug has been reintroduced (testing with 3.3RC3).
Comment #6 seems to indicate that there is a problem here, but the bug wasn't re-opened.
Could you open a new bug for the problem mentioned in comment 6 and reference this one. This makes it easier for bookkeeping purposes.
